Package dbAPI

Class CacheTable<T extends IRow>

java.lang.Object
dbAPI.AbstractTable
dbAPI.OnlineTable
dbAPI.CacheTable<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of rows in the table
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<IRow>
public class CacheTable<T extends IRow>
extends OnlineTable
Represents a database table that saves the data in memory
